summary: Use the ancient and forgotten dairy school of magic to defeat your opponents.
descriptionHtml:
[b]WARNING! THIS MOD IS NOT FOR THE LACTOSE INTOLERANT! CONSULT YOUR DOCTOR BEFORE USE[/b]

Lord Scheogorath has granted you knowledge not even Hermaeus Mora knows — the long forgotten ancient [i]Dairy school of magic[/i]. Featuring brand new spells that allow you to defeat your opponents using your cheese-incarnate powers! Summon cheese wheels from the realms of the madness! This cheese doesn't just do damage it will also send your opponents flying like mad CAUSE THEY CANT TAKE THE LACTOSE!

Technical info and installation:

Now unfortunately this was just made for a friend, but I decided to upload it, so the only way to obtain these spells is to use the console command.
Best way you can get these spells, without having to know your load order ID's is to simply type "help scheogorath" or "help greeny" (for the troll version) and find the following:

player.addspell <SPELL ID>

Scheogorath's Bolt (xx001D91) — Throw a powerful cheddar for an whooping 40 damage!
Scheogorath's Barrage (xx001D99) — Throw a constant barrage of dairy dealing 25 damage per second.
Greeny's Cheese (xx0022FC) — Overpowered madness just for fun

Big thanks for all the support and the [url=https://www.facebook.com/nexussites/photos/a.10156078951637834.1073741831.71629282833/10156217945312834/?type=3&theater]Nexus Facebook[/url] for the love <3
author: Shadowrend
